overview: Claude Opus 4.5, Anthropic’s latest model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot. In early testing, Claude Opus 4.5 surpassed internal coding benchmarks while cutting token usage in half, making this model especially well-suited for accelerating development in professional settings.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: Claude Opus 4.5, Anthropic’s latest model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot. In early testing, Claude Opus 4.5 surpassed internal coding benchmarks while cutting token usage in half, making this model especially well-suited for accelerating development in professional settings.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: Claude Opus 4.5 will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise users, priced at a promotional 1x premium request multiplier through December 5, 2025.
You’ll be able to select the model in the model picker in:
Copilot Chat in VS Code (Agent, Plan, Ask, and Edit mode)
Copilot Chat in GitHub Mobile (iOS and Android)
Rollout will be gradual. Check back soon if you don’t see it yet.
During the promotional period, Claude Opus 4.5 will also roll out as the default model for Copilot coding agent when enabled.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise & Business plans : Administrators must enable the Claude Opus 4.5 policy in Copilot settings.
Pro & Pro+ plans : For users in VS Code, select the model in the model picker and confirm the one-time prompt.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
